The Lord would have our physicians cooperate with Him in their treatment of the sick, showing more faith and using fewer drugs. Let us rely upon God. Our 


                                    -364- 

faith is feeble and our hearts remain unchanged. God would have a change take place. He says, "A new heart also will I give you" [Ezekiel 36:26]. When this promise is fulfilled to the people of God, the condition of things will be very different from what it now is.
